removeSong(String) - Static method in class com.punchline.javalib.utils.SoundManager
Removes a song from the SoundManager's memory, and returns it for disposing.
removeSound(String) - Static method in class com.punchline.javalib.utils.SoundManager
Removes a sound effect from the manager's memory, and returns it so it can be disposed.
Renderable - Interface in com.punchline.javalib.entities.components.render
Base class for all components that can be rendered.

resumeMusic() - Static method in class com.punchline.javalib.utils.SoundManager
Resumes the current music, if there is any paused.
